```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(showtext)

ipeds_panel2 <- read_csv("ipeds_panel2.csv")

font_add_google("Source Serif Pro", "serif_pro")
showtext_auto()
```

```{r}
model_trends <- feols(
  `Full-time retention rate` ~ i(year, treat, ref = 2019) | UnitID,
  cluster = ~UnitID,
  data = ipeds_panel2
)

png("dynamic_effects_retention.png", width = 800, height = 500, res = 150, bg = "white")
par(family = "serif_pro", cex.axis = 0.9, cex.lab = 1, cex.main = 1.2, las = 1, mar = c(5, 5, 4, 2) + 0.1)
iplot(model_trends, ref.line = 0, col = "#4682B4", ci.col = "#A4BEDC",
      main = "Dynamic Effects of COVID-19 on Retention Rates",
      xlab = "Years Relative to 2019 (Pre-Pandemic Baseline)",
      ylab = "Estimated Effect on Full-time Retention Rate (%)")
```
